alert.note: Alert for Dougherty; Lee; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 9:25PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dougherty, western Lee and southern Terrell Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 924 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dawson, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dawson, Leesburg, Albany, Sasser, Bronwood, Forrester, Bridges Crossroad, Palmyra, Century, Herod, Jordan Place, Clarks Mill, Dawson Municipal A/P, Starksville, Byne Crossroads, Scrutchins, Armena, Neyami, Chickasawhatchee and Mossy Dell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southwestern Georgia.
